caption.p: pH of the formulated and commercial toothpastes. DenSyzJatlax-(Triarotex)— Dennettia tripetala, Syzygium aromaticum, Jatropha curcas latex mixture. DenSyz-(Triaro)— Dennettia tripetala, Syzygium aromaticum mixture. SyzJatlax(Arotex)— Syzygium aromaticum, Jatropha curcas latex mixture. DenJatlax-(Tritex)— Dennettia tripetala, Jatropha curcas latex mixture. Syz-(Aro)— Syzygium aromaticum mixture. Den-(Tri)— Dennettia tripetala. Jatlax-(Tex)— Jatropha curcas latex. Placebo-without plant extracts material. Commercial fluoride toothpaste—Com A. Commercial herbal toothpaste—Com B. Commercial ordinary toothpaste—Com C
